name.en: System Security Design on Embedded Non-volatile Memory
name.ch: 嵌入式非揮發性記憶體系統安全設計

department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: The objective of this course is to teach student to understand what kind of system security issues and the risk of data leakage would be caused by NVM-based system development. Moreover, students can assess the risk of system security after taking this course.
goal.ch: 本課程主要達成的目標為：教授學生對於嵌入式非揮發性記憶體系統開發時產生的資訊安全風險以及系統可靠性評估。

content.en:
This course is composed of three units, each of which is a six-hour class:
1. Introduction to embedded system design (i.e., FreeRTOS) and implementation.
2. System design on non-volatile memory technologies.
3. The discussion of security system design on embedded memory and storage architectures.
content.ch:
本課程分為三個課程單元模組，每個課程模組約5小時：
1. 嵌入式系統FreeRTOS介紹與實作
2. 非揮發性記憶體技術系統設計
3. 嵌入式記憶體與儲存系統安全設計探討
